entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
